alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 8:41PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Pinellas County and southern Hillsborough County through 915 PM EDT... At 841 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Downtown Saint Petersburg and MacDill Air Force Base , moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Saint Petersburg, Downtown Saint Petersburg, St. Petersburg, Macdill Air Force Base, Gandy, West And East Lealman, Gulfport, Albert Whitted Airport, South Tampa, Tropicana Field, Weedon Island State Preserve, Venetian Isles, Vinoy Park, Lake Maggiore, Boyd Hill Nature Preserve, Crescent Lake, Pinellas Point and Snell Isle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
